name: Skrybblebot Can't Be Stopped!
description:
Skrybblebot can't stop walking! Turn corners by grabbing walls and jump over obstacles until he runs out of energy!

A/D, Left/Right, Left Analog Stick: Grab in respective direction. If there's not a wall in range, hold the button and Skrybblebot will grab as soon as possible!

Spacebar, A on Xbox gamepad: Jump!

Mouse, Right Analog Stick: Camera!

Esc: Get control of your mouse back!

---
